name: Bates Motel
overview: A "contemporary prequel" to the 1960 film Psycho, depicting the life of Norman Bates and his mother Norma prior to the events portrayed in Hitchcock's film, albeit in a different fictional town and in a modern setting. The series begins after the death of Norma's husband, when she purchases a motel located in a coastal Oregon town so she and Norman can start a new life.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: After finding his father dead, teenager Norman Bates and his mother, Norma, purchase a motel and move to White Pine Bay in search of a new life, but they soon discover this idyllic seaside town hides some deadly secrets. Unable to trust anyone but each other, the two indulge in a deeply twisted relationship that raises the question: does mother really know best?

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: In the aftermath of Miss Watson's murder, Norman's innocence is buried under blackouts, suspicious characters, and his strange behaviour. Meanwhile, Norma faces dark truths of her own when family secrets begin to unravel and looming threats from local villains jeopardize Norma's stab at happiness. No matter where you turn – there's no escaping what bubbles beneath the surface in White Pine Bay.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Bates Motel Season 3 offers more of the dark, twisted backstory of Norman Bates and how deeply intricate his relationship with his mother, Norma, truly is.  This season focuses on the evolution of the Bates family.  Norma finds strength to really look at the truth about her son for the first time.  And Norman is determined to gain some kind of control over his own mind.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: This season Norma becomes increasingly fearful and desperate, going to great lengths to find Norman the professional help he needs. This further complicates their once unbreakable trust while Norman struggles to maintain his grip on reality. Sheriff Romero once again finds himself drawn back into Norma and Norman’s lives. Will things finally heat up between Norma and the other man in her life, Sheriff Romero, and just how much further will he go to protect her?

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: The fifth and final season picks up almost two years after season 4. Now a grown man, Norman lives a double life: publicly, he's a happy and well-adjusted member of the White Pine Bay community, but at home he struggles; his violent blackouts continue to increase as ‘Mother’ threatens to take over his mind completely. Meanwhile, Dylan and Emma have been living their lives blissfully unaware of Norman’s full on descent into psychosis, and a vengeful Alex Romero hungers for a chance to destroy his stepson and avenge the murder of his one true love. In addition, new faces including the iconic Marion Crane, Madeleine Loomis and her husband Sam Loomis, and Sheriff Dana Greene become entangled in Norman’s life causing a chain of events that could blow the lid off his secret life.

tagline: She wouldn't even harm a fly.

episodes.name: First You Dream, Then You Die
episodes.overview: Widow Norma Bates and her shy teenage son, Norman, seek a fresh start in a coastal town filled with secrets. The arrival of an unexpected guest turns the Bates' lives upside down.

episodes.name: Nice Town You Picked, Norma...
episodes.overview: Dylan immediately begins causing trouble. The Bates are drawn into the secrets surrounding White Pine Bay.

episodes.name: What's Wrong with Norman
episodes.overview: Dylan learns there is more to his new job than he originally thought. Emma and Norman make a shocking discovery.

episodes.name: Trust Me
episodes.overview: Norma deals with distractions as her suspicions grow about certain town residents.

episodes.name: Ocean View
episodes.overview: Norma receives some much-needed help, while Norman desperately awaits his mother's return home. Emma and Norman follow more clues, leading to a big discovery.

episodes.name: The Truth
episodes.overview: Dylan asks Norman to move in with him; Norma warns Emma that some things are best kept to themselves.

episodes.name: The Man in Number 9
episodes.overview: The Bates Motel welcomes its first guest. Norman learns that popular girls come with many complications.

episodes.name: A Boy and His Dog
episodes.overview: A mysterious stranger causes problems for Norma. Bradley is not happy when rumors spread at school. Dylan and Remo go on a fateful road trip. Norman takes up a grisly hobby.

episodes.name: Underwater
episodes.overview: Abernathy increases the pressure. Bradley and Dylan connect. Miss Watson encourages Norman's active imagination. Emma takes a trip.

episodes.name: Midnight
episodes.overview: Romero decides to take action. Norman takes Emma to the dance. Norman gets a ride home from Miss Watson.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: After finding his father dead, teenager Norman Bates and his mother, Norma, purchase a motel and move to White Pine Bay in search of a new life, but they soon discover this idyllic seaside town hides some deadly secrets. Unable to trust anyone but each other, the two indulge in a deeply twisted relationship that raises the question: does mother really know best?

episodes.name: Gone But Not Forgotten
episodes.overview: Norman fixates on Miss Watson's death; Norma worries about the future of the motel when plans for the bypass move ahead of schedule; Bradley is driven to extremes as she searches for her father's killer.

episodes.name: Shadow of a Doubt
episodes.overview: Norma tries to distract Norman from his obsession with Miss Watson by joining a play.  Bradley turns to Norman for help when she has to escape a dire situation.  Romero is pressured to make an arrest for the murder.  A new player at work has Dylan and Remo on edge.

episodes.name: Caleb
episodes.overview: Dylan tries to bridge the gap between Norma and her brother Caleb, who shows up at the motel.  Norma meets an ally in her battle to stop the bypass.  Emma's memorial for a friend leads to a new relationship.  Norman falls under the influence of a townie girl.

episodes.name: Check-Out
episodes.overview: The fall-out from Caleb’s return causes Dylan to question his loyalty to Norma and Norman.  Christine brings Norma into the White Pine social scene.  Norman grows increasingly worried about Caleb’s presence in town.  Romero finds himself caught in the middle of Zane’s war with a rival drug family.

episodes.name: The Escape Artist
episodes.overview: Norman trusts Cody with a family secret.  Dylan finds himself fighting for his life as Zane’s war escalates.  Norma makes a deal with a mysterious man to help stop the bypass.

episodes.name: Plunge
episodes.overview: Dylan is asked to manage an explosive situation; Norma and Norman's relationship is threatened by a growing secret; Emma lands in a dangerous situation.

episodes.name: Presumed Innocent
episodes.overview: Norma's faith in Norman is questioned; Dylan is threatened by a revengeful Zane; Romero receives new evidence in the murder of Miss Watson; Cody and Norman's friendship reaches the breaking point.

episodes.name: Meltdown
episodes.overview: Romero digs deeper into the murder of Miss Watson; the conflict between the drug families leaves Dylan facing an impossible choice; Norma refuses to tell Norman the truth about his blackouts.

episodes.name: The Box
episodes.overview: Norma is desperate to connect with Norman; Dylan must decide if he should risk his life to save a loved one; Romero hopes a former colleague can help him determine Norman's involvement in a crime.

episodes.name: The Immutable Truth
episodes.overview: A tragic event from the past haunts Norman; Norma tries to prevent Norman from making a terrible mistake; Romero and Dylan find a way to end the drug war; Emma makes a decision about her future.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: In the aftermath of Miss Watson's murder, Norman's innocence is buried under blackouts, suspicious characters, and his strange behaviour. Meanwhile, Norma faces dark truths of her own when family secrets begin to unravel and looming threats from local villains jeopardize Norma's stab at happiness. No matter where you turn – there's no escaping what bubbles beneath the surface in White Pine Bay.

episodes.name: A Death in the Family
episodes.overview: Norman and Emma make decisions regarding their future; Norma informs Norman of his boundaries.

episodes.name: The Arcanum Club
episodes.overview: Norma and Norman focus on Annika's disappearance; Norma learns the truth about the Arcanum Club.

episodes.name: Persuasion
episodes.overview: Norman's relationship with Emma weakens his bond with Norma; Romero asks Norman some hard questions.

episodes.name: Unbreak-Able
episodes.overview: Emma and Norman spend a day away from the motel; Romero looks into two strange deaths in White Pine Bay; Norma returns to school; Caleb and Dylan's hidden secrets unravel.

episodes.name: The Deal
episodes.overview: Norma turns to Romero for guidance when she finds herself in an unexpected position of power.

episodes.name: Norma Louise
episodes.overview: Norma contemplates a life outside of White Pine Bay; Emma and Dylan bond while helping Norman.

episodes.name: The Last Supper
episodes.overview: Norman agrees to get help; Dylan learns disturbing news about Emma's health.

episodes.name: The Pit
episodes.overview: Romero confronts Norma about newly learned information; Caleb and Dylan take a risky job.

episodes.name: Crazy
episodes.overview: Norman spends the day with a surprise visitor; Norma attempts to keep secrets from being revealed.

episodes.name: Unconscious
episodes.overview: Norman's issues push Norma to the breaking point; Emma has an unexpected reaction to good news.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Bates Motel Season 3 offers more of the dark, twisted backstory of Norman Bates and how deeply intricate his relationship with his mother, Norma, truly is.  This season focuses on the evolution of the Bates family.  Norma finds strength to really look at the truth about her son for the first time.  And Norman is determined to gain some kind of control over his own mind.

episodes.name: A Danger to Himself and Others
episodes.overview: Norma searches for Norman, who finds himself in unfamiliar surroundings; Dylan waits for news about Emma; Romero gets a surprising proposition.

episodes.name: Goodnight, Mother
episodes.overview: Norma and Norman each suspect the other of a terrible deed; Dylan contemplates his future with Emma; Romero makes a choice that dramatically impacts the Bates family.

episodes.name: 'Til Death Do You Part
episodes.overview: Norma and Romero take a big step together; Norman attempts to accept his new circumstances; Dylan tries to shed old business.

episodes.name: Lights of Winter
episodes.overview: Norman and his new friend have an adventure; Norma experiences her first taste of real happiness in some time during an annual festival in White Pine Bay; Dylan becomes caught between two families.

episodes.name: Refraction
episodes.overview: Norman worries about revealing too much to Dr. Edwards; Norma hires an artisan to repair a window; a crime investigation threatens Romero's new life.

episodes.name: The Vault
episodes.overview: Norman uncovers painful truths as his therapy progresses; Norma works to prevent a secret from being revealed; Romero assists an old friend despite the risk to his career.

episodes.name: There's No Place Like Home
episodes.overview: Norman returns home after making an unanticipated discovery; Norma takes on new projects; Dylan's search for Emma's mother leads to disturbing results.

episodes.name: Unfaithful
episodes.overview: Norma is torn between Norman and Romero; during a holiday outing, Norman comes to the realization that everyone has changed during his time away.

episodes.name: Forever
episodes.overview: Norma and Norman attempt to reconnect as they plan for the future. Dylan and Romero decide to take action for Norman's own good.

episodes.name: Norman
episodes.overview: Norman plans a special event for his mother; Romero experiences pressure over his actions; Dylan considers reaching out to Norman.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: This season Norma becomes increasingly fearful and desperate, going to great lengths to find Norman the professional help he needs. This further complicates their once unbreakable trust while Norman struggles to maintain his grip on reality. Sheriff Romero once again finds himself drawn back into Norma and Norman’s lives. Will things finally heat up between Norma and the other man in her life, Sheriff Romero, and just how much further will he go to protect her?

episodes.name: Dark Paradise
episodes.overview: Norman tries to keep up appearances despite a troubling discovery. Dylan and Emma receive a surprise guest.

episodes.name: The Convergence of the Twain
episodes.overview: Norman's date doesn't go as planned. Romero's frustrations reach a boiling point. Chick brings Norman a gift.

episodes.name: Bad Blood
episodes.overview: Norman helps Chick with a project. Romero makes his move. An apologetic Madeleine reaches out to Norman.

episodes.name: Hidden
episodes.overview: Norman learns who he can rely on as he attempts to protect his secrets; Romero struggles to find safety.

episodes.name: Dreams Die First
episodes.overview: Norman tries to piece together Mother's movements; in Seattle, Dylan and Emma confront an ugly truth; Sam's girlfriend, Marion, makes an impulsive decision with far-reaching consequences.

episodes.name: Marion
episodes.overview: A special guest checks into the motel; Dylan grapples with devastating news; Sam and Madeleine's marriage reaches a crossroads.

episodes.name: Inseparable
episodes.overview: Norman and Mother are brought together as trouble looms large. Romero convalesces with the aid of an old friend. Dylan returns home.

episodes.name: The Body
episodes.overview: Mother uses tough love to protect Norman. Sheriff Greene opens a murder investigation. Dylan gets help for his brother.

episodes.name: Visiting Hours
episodes.overview: Norman's legal problems worsen. Emma takes care of family business as Dylan finds himself caught between his past and his future. Romero begins his plan for revenge.

episodes.name: The Cord
episodes.overview: Norman comes home.

5.name: Season 5
5.overview: The fifth and final season picks up almost two years after season 4. Now a grown man, Norman lives a double life: publicly, he's a happy and well-adjusted member of the White Pine Bay community, but at home he struggles; his violent blackouts continue to increase as ‘Mother’ threatens to take over his mind completely. Meanwhile, Dylan and Emma have been living their lives blissfully unaware of Norman’s full on descent into psychosis, and a vengeful Alex Romero hungers for a chance to destroy his stepson and avenge the murder of his one true love. In addition, new faces including the iconic Marion Crane, Madeleine Loomis and her husband Sam Loomis, and Sheriff Dana Greene become entangled in Norman’s life causing a chain of events that could blow the lid off his secret life.
